name: Whoopie Pies
author: Amy Kerby
summary: Little chocolate cakes with creamy filling. This recipe has been handed down in my family for quite sometime and hasn't had any complaints yet.
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix
directions: To make the cakes: Prepare mix as directed on package except using only 3/4 cup of water
Drop batter onto greased cookie sheet (or use parchment paper to line pan) in 2 1/2  to 3 inch circles
Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
To make the filling: In a saucepan, combine milk and flour and cook, stirring constantly until it forms a thick paste
In a medium bowl, beat sugar and shortening until fluffy
Add cooled flour mixture and beat until double in volume
Turn the little cakes over on their backs
Spoon a dollop of filling onto half of the little cakes
Place the other half of the cakes on top of the filling to form sandwiches
